Room.Name: Path Around the Manor
Room.ShortDescription: You are on a short path that leads around the south side of the Manor.
Room.LongDescription: You are on a strange path that leads around the Manor towards a large cave-like structure to the west. You can hear a lot of howling and growling from within the cave. The path appears to lead directly into the cave. The path heads back towards the entrance to the Manor to the north.
